titles.title: Protect Our Devices Act of 2016
To prohibit the Government from requiring any person to assist in devising a method for breaking the encryption of a wire or oral communication.
Protect Our Devices Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select), and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

committee.subcommittee: Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary:
Protect Our Devices Act of 2016
This bill prohibits the federal government from requiring a person to assist in devising a method for breaking the encryption of a wire or oral communication.
